question: Fifth Bilateral Meeting Between India and Malaysia Held in ___________.
explanation: The 5th Bilateral Technical Meeting on cooperation in the field of Traditional Systems of Medicine between Govt. of India and Malaysia was held in New Delhi. It was a part of the agreement signed between both countries in 2010. The Meeting had discussed the following agenda:- Establishment of Ayurveda Chair in University of UTAR, Malaysia, Professional training in Panchakarma therapy for Malaysian experts in India, The evaluation of safety and efficacy of combination Ayurvedic/ traditional products for clinical trials. Safety evaluation of Ayurvedic products based on Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) Bilateral MoU between National Medicinal Plants Board (NMPB), Ministry of AYUSH and Malaysia for Cooperation in the field of Medicinal Plants.
